price: Na lau kama wangeli simama sawasawa juu ya njia tungeli wanywesha maji kwa wingi,
arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا
footnotes: Na hakika lau kuwa watu na majini wakifuata Njia ya Uislamu, wala wasende upogo wakaiwacha, basi bila ya shaka tutawanywesha maji mengi yatakayo enea nyakati za haja.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-allawi is'taqāmū ʿalā al-ṭarīqati la-asqaynāhum māan ghadaqan
translations: surely We (would) have given them to drink
